name: Puppet News Network
description:
You are the fact-checking team that must verify facts of the news stories before they go on air. Drag and drop the post-it notes onto the nonsense words in the teleprompter to replace them with words that actually make sense. Or don't.

Supports up to 4 players (PS4 or Xbox controllers are recommended).

Steamed Hams is:

Andrew Afan - Programming, Design

Dillon Taylor - Writing, Voiceover

Emily Claire Afan - Writing, Voiceover

Gavin McCarthy - Art, Design
